attributes.action: provide sufficient taxpayer funding to keep Vulcan XH558 flying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The last remaining airworthy Vulcan, XH558, requires funding in order to keep it airworthy and to keep it flying at displays around the world. This aircraft is an iconic example of British engineering and is every bit as deserving of public funds as the Battle of Britain Memorial flight. It is also an excellent tool for promoting engineering education and training.

The money needed annually is very small change campared to the financial requirements of e.g. the Afghan war.

Please fund the project in order to preserve this example of great British engineering.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
